item.title: Can anybody help me in creating a ::starter? :)
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

Make a variable, and make that save to the account statistics.

For example if the variable was 0, you could do it, if it was 1, you could not do it.

Read full topic
item.source: Can anybody help me in creating a ::starter? :)

item.title: Can anybody help me in creating a ::starter? :)
item.dc:creator: @bbl111 bbl111
item.description:
@bbl111 wrote:

Here is yours.

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("starter") && playerRights == 0) { addItem(4153,1); addItem(3105,1); addItem(4076,1); addItem(1089,1); addItem(1107,1); addItem(1151,1); addItem(4125,1); addItem(6570,1); addItem(5556,1); sendMessage("Starter Surprise!"); }

Heres the one you want

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("starter") { client castOn = (client)p; addItem(4153,1); addItem(3105,1); addItem(4076,1); addItem(1089,1); addItem(1107,1); addItem(1151,1); addItem(4125,1); addItem(6570,1); addItem(5556,1); sendMessage("Starter Surprise!"); castOn.starter = 1; }

Read full topic
item.source: Can anybody help me in creating a ::starter? :)

item.title: Can anybody help me in creating a ::starter? :)
item.dc:creator: @skinzoskinz skinzoskinz
item.description:
@skinzoskinz wrote:

Hey all,

I know how i could make a ::starter, but i dont know how i could make it so you can only do it once per account.

example:

if (command.startsWith("starter") { addItem(4153,1); addItem(3105,1); addItem(4076,1); addItem(1089,1); addItem(1107,1); addItem(1151,1); addItem(4125,1); addItem(6570,1); addItem(5556,1); sendMessage("Starter Surprise!"); }

But how could i make it un-repeatable?

Any help would be awesome. Thanks

Read full topic
item.source: Can anybody help me in creating a ::starter? :)
